name: snitch
description: Security Audit Plugin - Evidence-based security scanning with anti-hallucination rules, interactive scan selection, and performance analysis. 35 categories including HIPAA, SOC 2, PCI-DSS, GDPR compliance, FIPS 140-3, ISO 27001/FedRAMP/CMMC, CVE/0-day auditing, and unused dependency detection. Context-aware analysis, zero false positives.
